Title: hasSubsequenceCaseInsensitiveUTF8
Description: haystack — String in which the search is performed. UTF-8 encoded String.needle — Subsequence to be searched. UTF-8 encoded String.
1, if needle is a subsequence of haystack, 0 otherwise. UInt8.
Examples: select hasSubsequenceCaseInsensitiveUTF8('ClickHouse - столбцовая система управления базами данных', 'СИСТЕМА');
